        private void cancelModifyCustomer​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Method to call after the mainMenu method after user confirms cancel action. LAMBDA EXPRESSION 1: This lambda expression simplified handling the response of the user to the cancel action. It would have taken a few extra lines of code to handle the cancel action without lambda.
        Parameters:
        event - the base class for FX events
